author: jpsnover
body:
Man allows you to do a Q for quit and then the help goes away and you see the screen as it was before you showed the help.  Our help is in-line and persists after it is done.  We should fit in better by doing what they do.
We should consider doing the same thing for Windows.

comments.author: JamesWTruher
comments.body: _my_ pager doesn't clear the screen :) - not so sure about this one - I appreciate seeing the help left on the screen.

comments.author: joeyaiello
comments.body: This raised the issue that we need a way to specify the pager being used by PowerShell so that the user can change between less, more, and the PS more function.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: Change the `more` PowerShell built-in to respect `$PAGER` instead of using `/bin/more`.

title: Linux should use less as pager, and respect $PAGER
